Name: Image of Perfection
About the game: Fight ghosts from your past and actual ghosts. It's been a long month for Sirius- not talking to most of your friends, having an angry ex talk about you behind your back, and having a friend claim... that her house is haunted? The past few weeks have been long for Hailey as well, as her house has seemingly become infested with ghosts that only she can see- that is, until a fateful day. Image of Perfection is a creepy, atmospheric RPG about confronting fears and your past. Rather than a pure horror RPG, this is a story-driven game is about confronting unsettling truths and accepting yourself. 2+ hours long Several battles, multiple bosses Many choices and secrets 2 endings
